description:
Experience a full recap of the best Team Urameshi fight scenes! Featuring the bruising match between Yusuke and Chu, a tough brawl against the Dr. Ichigaki Team, and watch Hiei call upon the flames of the Demon Realm against Zeru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho: Ankoku Bujutsukai no Shou - Gekan
映像白書~暗黒武術会の章~下巻
